Here is a list of all struct and union fields with links to the structures/unions they belong to:
  • blue : GLFWgammaramp
  • blueBits : GLFWvidmode
  • green : GLFWgammaramp
  • greenBits : GLFWvidmode
  • height : GLFWvidmode , GLFWimage
  • pixels : GLFWimage
  • red : GLFWgammaramp
  • redBits : GLFWvidmode
  • refreshRate : GLFWvidmode
  • size : GLFWgammaramp
  • width : GLFWvidmode , GLFWimage
